name: @low-systems/json-i
description: Compile JSON files from multiple files

scripts.clean: rm -rf docs/; rm -rf lib/; rm -rf coverage/
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && chmod +x lib/json-i.js && npm test && typedoc
scripts.bin-test: npm run clean && tsc && chmod +x lib/json-i.js && lib/json-i.js test-data/test.json5 test-data/test.json
